Bash(for file in app/api/futures_api.py app/api/strategy_analyzer_api.py app/api/paper_trading_api.py app/api/live_trading_api.py)

Bash(/dev/null <<'EOF'
SELECT id, name, LEFT\(config, 2000\) as config_part
FROM trading_strategies 
WHERE is_active = 1 
LIMIT 1;
EOF)

Bash(/dev/null <<'EOF'
SELECT 
    COUNT\(*\) as total_trades,
    SUM\(CASE WHEN realized_pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END\) as profitable,
    SUM\(CASE WHEN realized_pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END\) as losing,
    SUM\(realized_pnl\) as total_pnl,
    SUM\(fee\) as total_fee
FROM futures_positions 
WHERE symbol = 'LTC/USDT' 
  AND status = 'closed'
  AND created_at >= '2025-12-24 23:00:00'
  AND created_at < '2025-12-25 04:00:00';
EOF)

Bash(/dev/null <<'EOF'
-- æŸ¥çœ‹æœ‰è¿ç»­Kçº¿é…ç½®çš„ç­–ç•¥æ•°é‡
SELECT COUNT\(*\) as total, 
       SUM\(CASE WHEN config LIKE '%consecutiveBearish%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END\) as with_consecutive 
FROM trading_strategies WHERE is_active = 1;
EOF)

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
import pymysql
from datetime import datetime

conn = pymysql.connect\(
    host=''13.212.252.171'',
    port=3306,
    user=''admin'',
    password=''Tonny@1000'',
    database=''binance-data'',
    charset=''utf8mb4''
\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# æ£€æŸ¥è¡¨æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
cursor.execute\(''SHOW TABLES LIKE ""blockchain_gas_daily""''\)
table_exists = cursor.fetchone\(\)

if table_exists:
    # æŸ¥è¯¢æœ€è¿‘çš„æ•°æ®
    cursor.execute\(''''''
        SELECT chain_name, date, total_gas_used, total_transactions, 
               total_gas_value_usd, data_source, created_at
        FROM blockchain_gas_daily 
        ORDER BY date DESC, chain_name 
        LIMIT 20
    ''''''\)
    results = cursor.fetchall\(\)
    
    if results:
        print\(''æœ€è¿‘çš„GASç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®:''\)
        print\(''-'' * 100\)
        for row in results:
            print\(f''{row[0]:12} | {row[1]} | {row[2]:15,.0f} | {row[3]:10,} | $row[4]:10,.2f | {row[5]:10} | {row[6]}''\)
    else:
        print\(''âŒ è¡¨å­˜åœ¨ä½†æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®''\)
    
    # æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®æ€»æ•°å’Œæ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´
    cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\), MIN\(date\), MAX\(date\) FROM blockchain_gas_daily''\)
    stats = cursor.fetchone\(\)
    print\(f''\\næ€»æ•°æ®é‡: {stats[0]} æ¡''\)
    print\(f''æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: {stats[1]} ~ {stats[2]}''\)
else:
    print\(''âŒ è¡¨ blockchain_gas_daily ä¸å­˜åœ¨''\)

cursor.close\(\)
conn.close\(\)
")
